SELECT cb_id, title, content, hit, reg_date, name, img_path FROM community_board c, member m WHERE m.m_id = c.m_id AND classify = #{classify} AND enable = 1 AND title LIKE '%${keyword}%' ORDER BY cb_id DESC LIMIT #{Page}, #{PageSize}

SELECT cb_id, title, content, hit, reg_date, name, img_path FROM community_board c, member m WHERE m.m_id = c.m_id AND classify = #{classify} AND enable = 1 AND content LIKE '%${keyword}%' ORDER BY cb_id DESC LIMIT #{Page}, #{PageSize}

SELECT cb_id, title, content, hit, reg_date, name, img_path FROM community_board c, member m WHERE m.m_id = c.m_id AND classify = ${classify} AND enable = 1 AND (title LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR content LIKE '%${keyword}%') ORDER BY cb_id DESC LIMIT #{Page}, #{PageSize}
